title: Having leaver buster over something i couldnt control :/
body: last game i was suspiciously lagging right before every fight on my team, my connection problem or ddos? im not sure but it made me get a leaver buster which made me upset. It was least likely on my end though since i reset the router and modem before my game

replies.body: Can you define "lagging" a bit more for me? This term is often used as a catch-all for many different issues, so clarifying can help me understand what actually happened. Examples could be any changes you saw in your "FPS" or "Ping", or if you saw things running in place, teleporting around, etc.
